This website was created by and is actively maintained by
[Dan Capellupo](https://dancapellupo.com/). I am a former PhD astronomer, and I
have now been a data scientist for over 6 years.

I will be happy to hear any feedback you have. If you have any comments on any
of the articles I post about on this site, please let me know and I can add
them to the articles.

If you know of any articles appropriate for an experienced DS audience, also
please send those my way!
